tweets.text: Health harms have now spread to 4.6 miles outside the landfill as of 3 weeks ago. This is not contained to our community, this is still spreading. What will it take for the @EnvAgency and @UKParliament to curtail the @RedIndustries2 waste activities ? #stopthestink https://t.co/otUS63obnd
Newcastle-under-Stinks!ü§¢ü§Æüò∑ü§Æü§¢ It stinks every evening in Milehouse now it‚Äôs a bloody joke! #StopTheStink @NewsNBC @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe

Thanks to @bcu_ucu for highlighting the terrible conditions we are suffering in #newcastleunderlyme @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice #stopthestink https://t.co/YDKHAgGeEr

@eabroken2020 @EnvAgency They say ring the police. Police say ring the council. Council say ring the EA. Then they all say its a civil matter. No one knows who‚Äôs job it is or is it just a case of sloppy shoulders. Its a mess!

tweets.text: Thanks @JuliaBradbury for your powerful support. This is causing so many people unimaginable misery on top of the health concerns. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @Simonwhite1966 @Ruralpumkin @SimonTagg @JeremyLefroy @JeremyPert @RobSmith_Star @SoTCityCouncil @NewsNBC @BillCashMP https://t.co/Sf4NYJhHhK

@EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @DrMariaNeira @antheaturner @JuliaBradbury @mwilliamsthomas 

The annoyance level for hydrogen sulphide (h2s) is 7 ugm3. 

Would anyone at the EA like to comment on why we are seeing figures as high as 1017 ugm3. 

#StopTheStink https://t.co/G4jobNaxsi

Why is there no sense of urgency from the @EnvAgency or @RedIndustries2 Is it just how they communicate (or don‚Äôt in Reds case)?The message was clear from yesterday that the landfill is out of control &not behaving how anyone expects #stopthestink

@Bigdwazda @EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @DrMariaNeira @AntheaTurner @JuliaBradbury @mwilliamsthomas Shocking it‚Äôs still so high after the colossal figures in March! Yes we know the figure is averaged out over 24 hours for the reports but these readings are massive for a one time hit of it. And let‚Äôs be honest @EnvAgencyMids we all know it lasts longer indoors #stopthestink https://t.co/iFSXPTBS7O
@StinkStopthe so much for RED claiming to be environmentally friendly. üò£ @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA

@EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA Yet another stinking 24 hours Clare. What IS your challenge because I do not think that many people can take much more in a physical or mental health sense. There is precedent for closure with less complaints, and less breach of licence. CLOSE IT and SORT IT!
More appalling works at Cley from the Environmental Destruction Agency... https://t.co/veZch7FVw6

tweets.text: It‚Äôs good to see references to the UN #SustainableDevelopmentGoals everywhere here. The @EnvAgency is starting to steer projects using the #SDGs and and have now mapped our activities against the goals for two years. The construction of the Boston Barrier is a good example. https://t.co/q1qlRFDZ62

tweets.text:
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @MattHancock thank you for your obvious lack of concern but my home has just been flooded by a tsunami of vile toxic landfill gases. Now nearly throwing up, have a blinding headache and heart rates off the scale. Sick of this üò°

@StinkStopthe https://t.co/hNfCknycMK

Look up Smokey Mountain Manila. The once notorious landfill mountain looks not much different to our own. It is shameful that we even slightly resemble a 3rd world community  @DrMariaNeira @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @ShaunLintern @JournoJess_ @stopthestink https://t.co/mKzIwaDlRs

@EnvAgencyMids Well your 'challenges' are obviously not working, so how about actually 'doing' something? I'm not able to open my windows this morning because of the stink and I live over a mile from the epicentre. Why don't you try living in this area- then you might understand our anger.

@EnvAgencyMids Don't believe a word you promised 1/5/21  clean air,cell capped, 1 partially, it's made it worse , 24/7 now as well as then 7/7 it was, total joke organisation with no purpose, @RedIndustries2 running rings round you, you will be held to account with @ClareDinnisEA #stopthestink
@EnvAgencyMids The stink filled my child's classroom this week 6 children are currently off sick. We are now ordering purifiers throughout. How can this be right?
@G20KAB @EnvAgencyMids Just got work and it's still the same, will leave work at 7am and it will still be the same, the amount of complaints we get at night is staggering.
@EnvAgencyMids You‚Äôve allowed this malpractice. Who pays? My grandkids in headaches and nosebleeds that shouldn‚Äôt occur. @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe

@EnvAgencyMids Perhaps @RedIndustries2 could cover all parking costs in Newcastle to mitigate the damage being done to the town's hard pressed businesses? Or maybe you could go halves @EnvAgencyMids ?
@itswilsss @EnvAgencyMids A relations manager that has gone straight onto  annual leave too unless I‚Äôm mistaken !!

@EnvAgencyMids How about stopping operations until they are compliant at the very least? Your allowing a company to accept further waste onto a site which has been found in breach of 10 regulations and all they‚Äôve been seen to of done is hire a Relations Manager... How can you justify this?
@EnvAgencyMids Stop challenging. Start prosecuting. At the very least stop them operating until they are compliant

@EnvAgencyMids The ‚Äòlatest‚Äô is same as ever. EA identifies breaches, issues compliance deadline and nothing improves. How long these useless deadlines which only give the operator longer to fill their coffers (probbefore the inevitable happens) and they leave the site. Step in now EA & CAP IT!
@EnvAgencyMids How many breaches are required before you close them down please? It‚Äôs a serious question @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink #resign

@EnvAgencyMids I dont even bother reading it anymore. This in time will go down as the biggest cover up the EA have ever been involved with. You are NOT above the law and you people at the top will face many uncomfortable years ahead.

@EnvAgencyMids What‚Äôs the plan? What‚Äôs the root cause of the toxic gas?What are the plan‚Äôs milestones & delivery dates? What progress have @RedIndustries2 made against milestones? @ClareDinnis it appears you are just hoping the malodorous vapour goes- no plan, no confidence #stopthestink
@EnvAgencyMids Operations need to be STOPPED until this is a well run compliant site WITHOUT any breaches !!! #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe
@amy_shann @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids Exactly. Many many landfills across the country run without a fuss or breaches that don‚Äôt have any issues. No NO excuses!!!!!

@ldmartens1 @davemh72 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @WHO Tortured with sleep deprivation which in april was 12 nights in a row a night off then many more sleepless nights, our bodies won't let us sleep in that toxic air, flight respinsr kicks in but at 3 am where can we go, evacuation is only answer given they won't #stopthestink

We are delighted to announce our Spring release date for #watervoles has been confirmed for 2022. Thanks to @gow_derek @EnvAgency @thameswater @SE_Rivers_Trust @RBKingston for visiting the Hogmsill to discuss the feasibility of the project. Read more: https://t.co/GJzGTXsuRI https://t.co/3LqR8HygWl

Staggeringly high Hydrogen Sulphide levels being measured at the EA testing site in April near Whaley‚Äôs & 10 times worse at night!! Man-made or not seems urgent question as people aren‚Äôt sleeping at night @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @WHO https://t.co/ORwkI7hT4Z

It was a step in transparency. It does not take away from the fact that this is a National Emergency. The site should cease operations while an extensive onsite investigation is csrried out into historic problems and more recent failiures. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @JuliaBradbury https://t.co/lIryslr2lU

Good God Almighty, @WHO on earth @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids would sanction this ? What inhumane rush for money is this all about? Just a couple of years difference. @JuliaBradbury @DrMariaNeira @ShaunLintern @JournoJess_ @ClareDinnisEA @StinkStopthe https://t.co/UBOWZ4zDek
